summary: Completed comprehensive frontend UI/UX testing of KommunalCRM application. The redesigned interface with dark sidebar, modern color scheme, and improved typography is working excellently. All major features tested successfully including dashboard, navigation, calendar, and mobile responsiveness.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu button click intercepted by overlay element preventing sidebar from opening
ui_bugs.details: Overlay element with class 'fixed top-0 z-[100]' intercepts click events on mobile menu button

passed_tests: Dashboard page loads correctly with new design
Dark sidebar navigation visible and properly styled
All navigation links in sidebar function correctly
4 stat cards display properly with colored icons (sky, amber, emerald, violet)
Calendar view renders correctly with legend and navigation
Calendar navigation (previous/next month, today button) works perfectly
Quick Actions section renders with all 4 action buttons
Mobile responsive design - bottom navigation appears correctly
Profile section in sidebar footer is accessible
Public Sans font applied to headings correctly
Sky blue accent color used throughout interface
Mobile stat cards arranged in proper 2x2 grid layout
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile menu overlay issue - the mobile menu button click is being intercepted by an overlay element preventing the sidebar from opening on mobile devices
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (1 minor mobile menu issue out of 9 major features tested)
